snippet: Kentucky Derby celebrations, a ramp festival, a food book fair and more events this week.
lead_paragraph: Just Don't Order The artist Rachel Lee Hovnanian blurs the lines between reality, technology and fiction in her exhibition ''Mud Pie,'' Wednesday to June 2 at Leila Heller Gallery, 568 West 25th Street. It includes an ersatz diner where the smells are genuine but the coffee and barbecue are from a chemistry lab. Gallery hours are Tuesday to Saturday, 10 a.m. to 6 p.m.
